Package me.talkcode.acc.core.bookkeeping.model

Interface AccountingPeriod

public interface AccountingPeriod
An accounting period, is a companyâ€™s financial reporting period. The accounting period is typically a period of twelve months, however, this API leaves it open for any duration. Organizations can choose to have their accounting period begin and end on any dates.

    Description

    end()
    Ends the accounting period.

    Gets the identity of the Accounting Scheme used in this period.
